heroSection.title: House Cup 2025
heroSection.subtitle: Join us for a definitely-not-a-cult showdown among fearless Erasmus adventurers, proudly governed by the House Cup Rules 2025.

welcomeSection.title: Welcome to the Madness!
welcomeSection.descriptionHtml: Each Erasmus warrior is magically (and scientifically?) placed into one of four Houses. Every weekly event (plus the occasional Gambit) can catapult your House’s score or doom you to glorious embarrassment. Please, for the love of Darwin, don’t offer Constructive Feedback; that’s Treason.

highlights.text: If your House fails, you’ll have one last chance to perform a Yardie (beer-chug) or suffer public hanging
Public Nudity can snag you 30 points. Round up ten or more streakers for a 1000-point jackpot. Seriously.

welcomeSection.footerHtml: Insanity is calling! Check out the Full Rules to learn how "Buffaloed" can cost you points and how "Constructive Feedback" can land you in hot water—or at the gallows.

housesSection.title: Meet The Four Houses
housesSection.subtitle: Our Founders used the 16Personalities Test to create each House (section 3). You’ll do the same but with our in-house quiz!

houseList.name: Red Storm
houseList.motto: Roar like a Tiger, chill like a Panda.

featureList.title: Mandatory Weekly House Events
featureList.description: Miss even one event, and your House is slapped with a 50-point penalty.

featureList.title: Gambits & Super Gambits
featureList.description: Earn extra points on the fly. But if you get caught cheating thrice before midnight, expect harsh retribution.

featureList.title: Team Pride
featureList.description: Show up in House colors (or shout the loudest) to score sweet bonus points. Vocal cords are expendable!

featureList.title: Armistices
featureList.description: Conspire with exactly 1 or 2 other Houses to share points. Slightly shady? Sure. Entirely allowed? Absolutely.

principleSection.title: The Founding Principle
principleSection.mainTextHtml: On the auspicious evening of the Strawberry Moon, whichever House towers over the scoreboard gets the coveted House Pokal. The rest have exactly one week to guzzle a Yardie or suffer comedic doom (a.k.a. public hanging).
principleSection.secondaryTextHtml: Yes, we let murder slide, but we won’t tolerate skipping House Events or treacherous side deals. Priorities, right? May the best House triumph!

instagramSection.title: Follow Our Wild Journey
instagramSection.description: Peek behind the curtain: heroic yard-chugs, unfortunate “Buffaloed” mishaps, and spontaneous public nudity stunts.
